DESCRIPTION: [soulbindermod:VenomIcon] #yVenom damage applies [soulbindermod:PoisonIcon] equal to half of the unblocked damage dealt.
[soulbindermod:FrostIcon] #yFrost damage applies [soulbindermod:RimeIcon] equal to half of the unblocked damage dealt.
Lose X HP as a cost to play this card, then increase X by #b1 this combat.
Spend X #ySouls from your soul gem for a Bonus Effect. NL #ySoulshatter is always paid if possible.
#yRimed creatures grant [soulbindermod:BlockIcon] equal to half their [soulbindermod:RimeIcon] when attacked and [soulbindermod:RimeIcon] is reduced by #b1.

Creatures with [soulbindermod:FrostFeverIcon] #yFrost #yFever do not have their [soulbindermod:RimeIcon] or [soulbindermod:PoisonIcon] reduced. Each turn, [soulbindermod:FrostFeverIcon] #yFrost #yFever is reduced by #b1
#ySouls are gathered by slaying non-Minion enemies and stored within your #ySoul #yGem
#ySouls are stored in your #ySoul #yGem. Gain #b1 #ySoul when a non-minion enemy dies. NL #ySouls are used to determine the effect value of some cards.
[soulbindermod:SoulBarrierIcon] #ySoul #yBarrier reduces HP lost. NL [soulbindermod:SoulBarrierIcon] is reduced by #b1 when you take damage.
#yNetherworld #yResonance increases the damage and Block gain of #yUndead cards and the potency of #yCoalesced orbs.
#yUndead cards are special cards that channel orbs when #yExhausted.
#yBury effects occur when this card enters the #yexhaust pile
#yEntombing a card Exhausts it. Add it to your hand the next time your draw pile is shuffled. #yEntombed cards will trigger #yBury effects instead of leaving the #yexhaust pile by other means.
Removed until the end of combat. Does #rNot go to the exhaust pile but can be viewed there.
#yReclaiming a card sends it from the #yexhaust pile to the discard pile it #yExiles when played.
#yExploit abilities activate on the target(s) of this card if they have [soulbindermod:PoisonIcon] [REMOVE_SPACE] .
#yOrb: #yPassive : Deals damage to random enemies. #yEvoke : Grants [soulbindermod:BlockIcon] [REMOVE_SPACE] .
#yOrb: Applies [soulbindermod:PoisonIcon] to ALL enemies increasing #yEvoke power by #b1.
Right click this card while its in your hand to Swap it to it's other side.
#yCoalescing an Orb creates an orb slot, fills it with an orb
#yOrb: #yPassive : Applies [soulbindermod:RimeIcon] to random enemies. #yEvoke : Grants [soulbindermod:BlockIcon] equal to the size of your exhaust pile.
#yOrb: #yPassive : Deals damage to random enemies and Grants [soulbindermod:TempHPIcon] [REMOVE_SPACE] .
